habitswipe.title: Habitswipe
habitswipe.description: A habit-building app with reminders, progress analytics, and social accountability to help you stay consistent.
habitswipe.long_description: Habitswipe helps you build consistency with habit tracking, social motivation, and smart automation. It combines fast daily check-ins, clear progress analytics, and an AI coach in one place with privacy-focused data handling.
habitswipe.summary_point_1_text: set recurring habits and anti-habits, then track completion with clear daily and weekly progress views.
habitswipe.summary_point_2_text: follow friends, share progress and stay consistent with reminders and accountability loops.
habitswipe.summary_point_3_text: connect tools like Notion, Telegram, Google Calendar, Habitica and Apple Reminders.

vanta.title: Vanta
vanta.description: A privacy-first personal finance app for budgets, spending visibility, and secure bank connectivity with explicit consent.
vanta.long_description: Vanta is a privacy-first personal finance app designed for daily money control. Your core data stays on-device, while bank connectivity is enabled only after explicit consent, so you can monitor accounts and spending securely.
vanta.summary_point_1_text: your personal finance data is stored locally on your device.
vanta.summary_point_2_text: only when you connect accounts and provide consent; authentication happens with your bank.

koalin.title: Koalin
koalin.description: A collection catalog system for porcelain and ceramics with provenance, hallmarks, photos, and inventory records.
koalin.long_description: Koalin helps collectors identify, catalog, and manage porcelain and ceramic pieces in a structured way. It keeps provenance notes, hallmarks, photos, and inventory metadata organized so every item in your collection is easy to track.
koalin.summary_point_1_text: record items with provenance, hallmarks, photos and detailed inventory attributes.
koalin.summary_point_2_text: keep collections structured with search, filtering and status tracking for each piece.
koalin.summary_point_3_text: collection data stays on-device by default unless you explicitly export or share it.
